title: Modulation of cherry tomato performances in response to molybdenum biofortification and arbuscular mycorrhizal fungi in a soilless system
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Lorena Vultaggio, Enrica Allevato, Leo Sabatino, Georgia Ntatsi, Youssef Rouphael, Livio Torta, Salvatore La Bella, Beppe Benedetto Consentino
